Outline Color

# Outline Color

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                       | Support     |
| --------------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
outline-inherit
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
outline-current
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
outline-transparent
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
outline-black
```       | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
outline-white
```       | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
outline-{n}
```         | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
outline-[n]
```         | 🌐 Web only |
